theDeathNotice.CardDeck

Package Description
theDeathNotice  

  • Uses of CardDeck in theDeathNotice

    Methods in theDeathNotice that return CardDeck
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    CardDeck Game.getCardDeck()
    Gets the CardDeck used for the game.
    Methods in theDeathNotice with parameters of type CardDeck
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Player.drawCard​(CardDeck cards)
    Draws the top card from the deck of cards by adding it to the hand of the player and removing it from the card deck.
